name: places/ChIJI-XXlx32wokRwErMTqZBcyY
formattedAddress: 1490 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1490 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10029, USA

editorialSummary.text: Drugstore & pharmacy chain selling products including cosmetics, vitamins & mini-mart basics.

originalText.text: Staff can be helpful, but they can also be very rude! They need a better phone system, they leave people on hold and they let the phone ring ring ring then guess what you get hung up on. Emails get sent with a pick up date and when you go to pick up the medication as directed by the email quess what its not ready so you have to wait more that 30 minutes. Overall they need a management makeover!!! Obviously management needs help

Overall they need a management makeover!!! Obviously management needs help

originalText.text: The Pharmacy staff customer service skills need to be majorly improved. No smiles inviting people to be confident enough to work with them. The worst attitudes over the phone as if they don't want to deal with you. All are out of sync and want to pass the buck to the other. I hope to improve this rating for them as time goes by. I can't deal in a good way with dismissive attitudes towards me and others. This is medicine that people need not for animals.

text.text: The Pharmacy staff customer service skills need to be majorly improved. No smiles inviting people to be confident enough to work with them. The worst attitudes over the phone as if they don't want to deal with you. All are out of sync and want to pass the buck to the other. I hope to improve this rating for them as time goes by. I can't deal in a good way with dismissive attitudes towards me and others. This is medicine that people need not for animals.

originalText.text:
There is no one in the pharmacy department that cares to pick up a call from a Medical Clinic to assist patients in obtaining their prescriptions orderly and properly. The phone is constantly left on hold; someone picks up, and then proceeds to place the call on an immediate hold.....
and it happens over and over again, with no one ever picking up.

This completely unprofessional and unacceptable.

There should 'always' be a pharmacist willing to pick up a call from a Medical Practice and or Clinic, immediately. If this is how they treat provider offices, I can only imagine what patients who are trying to obtain their prescriptions must suffer through with these pharmacy!

Have your scripts re-routed elsewhere!

originalText.text: A bunch of degenerates trying to run a pharmacy. They can care less about customer service. They don’t do their job and when you get upset they get upset. You people are pathetic. Simply pathetic.

text.text: A bunch of degenerates trying to run a pharmacy. They can care less about customer service. They don’t do their job and when you get upset they get upset. You people are pathetic. Simply pathetic.

originalText.text: I would honestly like to give this store ZERO stars but im in a nice mood today. First off, I have been to plenty of Duane Reade's AKA Walgreen's throughout NYC and even outside of NYC. I work near this store so unfort i frequent often. Always run into the same issues over and over. First big issue, EMPTY shelves ! The restock in this store is horrendous. Can no longer use the pandemic excuse of supply being thin. Second big issue, certain workers with attitude problems. God forbid they have to put down the phone to help a customer. So sorry ! Its mind boggling that this store has always had these same issues for my 12 years of working in the area. The manager(s) should be ashamed of themselves. Should just close the location and make it into a CVS.
